name: 1kappa
description: 1Kappa monorepo with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
scripts.restart:all: npm run stop:all && sleep 2 && npm run dev
scripts.stop:all: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -ti:3001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
